channel.title: adc.io - Adventures of a terrible developer
channel.description: Recent content on adc.io - Adventures of a terrible developer

item.title: About
item.description: Hello there, I’m Michael. I’m a developer, musician, father, maker, and native to the Atlanta area. I’m currently a Senior Security Software Engineer at GE Power. What’s the point of this site? Day-to-day, I deal with a pretty wide variety of issues, and I start side projects all the time, although I usually never complete them. So this website is mostly for documenting some of the various challenges I’ve dealt with along the way.
